def: Containing mammalian remains; -- said of certain strata.
The production or absorption of heat at the junction of twometals on the passage of a current. Heat generated by the passage ofthe current in one direction will be absorbed if the current isreversed.
Capable of being chased; fit for hunting. Gower.
A tall tree (Simaruba amara) growing in tropical America. It isone of the trees which yields quassia.
An explosive containing nitroglycerin. It is used in blasting.
A division of ungulate mammals, including those that have anodd number of toes, as the horse, tapir, and rhinoceros; -- opposedto Artiodactyla.
A California scorp√¶noid fish (Sebastichthys rhodochloris),having brilliant colors.
Not be exhausted; inexhaustible; as, an exhaustless fund orstore.
Dividing into cells or segments; characterized by separationinto two or more parts or sections by the formation of internalpartitions; as, merismatic growth, where one cell divides into many.
A genus of shrubs and trees, mostly American or Asiatic,abounding in resinous and aromatic substances. Styrax officinalisyields storax, and S. Benzoin yields benzoin.
